definition: Abbas (name)/Mahmoud Abbas (1935-), also called Abu Mazen, Palestinian leader, Chairman of the Palestinian National Authority (PNA) from 2005
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: Mitchell failed Tuesday to persuade Mr. Abbas to engage in direct talks with Israel.
sentences.chinese: 米切尔星期二没能说服阿巴斯与以色列开展直接对话。

sentences.english: For the time being, Mr Abbas has reasserted his authority.
sentences.chinese: 从目前来看，阿巴斯重新树立了自己的权威。

sentences.english: In the meantime, Mr Abbas could stay in charge as a caretaker.
sentences.chinese: 在此期间，阿巴斯将会继续照料政务。

sentences.english: Mahmoud Abbas vowed to continue the search for a two-state solution with Israel.
sentences.chinese: 阿巴斯誓言要继续同以色列寻求两国并存的解决之道。

sentences.english: But Mr. Abas's chances are uncertain.
sentences.chinese: 但是拉阿巴斯先生的前途并不确定。

sentences.english: After Mr Abbas steps down, who will take over?
sentences.chinese: 现在阿巴斯即将离开，谁将接下重任？

sentences.english: A spokesman for Mr. Abbas accused the Israeli leader of sabotaging the peace process.
sentences.chinese: 阿巴斯的发言人指责以色列领导人的破坏和平进程。

sentences.english: He let virtually all Fatah's delegates attend the congress (a courtesy Hamas did not extend) and in private was generally well-disposed towards its outcome.
sentences.chinese: 事实上阿巴斯曾以全票通过的结果连任成功。

sentences.english: Abbas could also try to cut a new power-sharing deal with Hamas.
sentences.chinese: 阿巴斯也试着与哈马斯达成权利分享的计划。

sentences.english: Mr Abbas has sworn in a new government led by a technocrat.
sentences.chinese: 阿巴斯已经在专家政治论者领导下的新政府宣誓。

sentences.english: Mr. Abas moved to New York this year and has quickly settled in.
sentences.chinese: 今年拉阿巴斯先生来到纽约并定居于此。

sentences.english: Our stone warehouse is one of the largest and best-equipped warehouses in the port.
sentences.chinese: 我们仓库是班达阿巴斯港口最大和最好的仓库之一。

definition: to give careful consideration to/to display thoughtfulness towards
Franklin/Benjamin Franklin (1706-1790), US Founding Father, scientist and author/surname Franklin
Schröder (name)/Gerhard Schröder (1944-), German SPD politician, Chancellor 1998-2005
Moore or Moor (name)/see also 摩爾人|摩尔人[Mo2 er3 ren2]
